metadata.name: Web Search Synthesis
metadata.description: Evaluates researcher agent's ability to effectively use web search and synthesize results

testCase.userPrompt: What are the latest developments in renewable energy technology?

results.title: Solar Panel Efficiency Breakthrough
results.snippet: New perovskite-silicon tandem solar cells achieve 33% efficiency, surpassing traditional silicon panels. Commercial production expected by 2025.

results.title: Offshore Wind Capacity Doubles
results.snippet: Global offshore wind capacity reached 64 GW in 2023. Floating wind turbines now operational in deeper waters, opening new installation sites.

results.title: Green Hydrogen Production Advances
results.snippet: Electrolyzer costs dropped 40% in two years. Major projects in Australia and Chile aim to produce green hydrogen at $2/kg by 2026.

requiredElements.value: discusses more than one type of renewable energy like solar, wind, or hydrogen
includes specific developments, numbers, or recent achievements

optionalElements.value: discusses future expectations or upcoming milestones
connects information into a coherent narrative
